entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of snow squalls early this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. Forecast issued 11:05 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:05 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:05 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
